price: Kaya noong nakadama sila ng parusa Namin, biglang sila mula roon ay tumatakas.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
